title: MeitY Unveils Dynamic Pavilion at IITF 2025 Showcasing Digital India & IndiaAI
description: The pavilion, a highlight of IITF 2025, embodies India’s expanding digital footprint, bringing together the country’s progress in digital governance, artificial intelligence, and citizen engagement.
content: Shri Jitin Prasada, Hon’ble Minister of State for the Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY), inaugurated the MeitY Pavilion at the 44th India International Trade Fair (IITF) held at Bharat Mandapam, New Delhi. The pavilion, a hig... [4864 chars]

content:

title: Best Deals To Tailored Products: How Shoppers Are Using AI To Maximise Benefits
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) is increasingly penetrating all aspects of our daily lives. From job hunts to therapy and even shopping, people are finding new ways to use AI to save time and money. With the rapid rise of e-commerce platforms, shoppers across the globe are finding new ways to maximise their benefits. Be it the busy holiday sales in the United States or the festive season in India, AI tools help shoppers to grab the best offers and deals.

title: Andhra govt, WEF to set up centre for energy and cyber resilience
description: Andhra Pradesh and the World Economic Forum agreed to set up a centre to strengthen energy and cyber safety. CM Chandrababu Naidu highlighted major green-energy goals, investment promises, and future growth plans. Using futuristic technologies such as artificial intelligence (AI), power transmission losses and supply costs should be slashed, said the CM.

title: AI weather models promise faster, accurate forecasts
description: Artificial intelligence is reshaping weather forecasting by learning from decades of them – not by rewriting the laws of physics, according to one expert.
content:
Artificial intelligence is reshaping how people predict the weather by learning from decades of forecasts – not by rewriting the laws of physics, according to one expert.

title: Kim Kardashian's Failed Bar Exam Reveals 'Dangerous' Trend, Experts Warn
description: Experts tell Newsweek there's a new "problem" emerging when it comes to artificial intelligence.
content: Kim Kardashian’s public failure to pass key law exams, after relying on ChatGPT for legal advice, has reignited debate about the dangers of using generative artificial intelligence (AI) in high-stakes professional contexts. As AI adoption grows acros... [7102 chars]
